2 2 50 Results
  The subdirectory 'results' is used for CalcHEP 
output. 
  Function 'View' creates and displays the contents
of this subdirectory and gives you the possibility
to view a file.
  'Clear' removes all output files.
  'Rename' assigns a new name to 'results' and 
creates a new empty directory 'results' for the
output.
